trans-unit.source: The base class for a collection of parameters relevant to a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameterCollection"></xref> class.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> to add to the collection.
The index of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object in the collection.
Adds an array of items with the specified values to the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameterCollection"></xref>.
An array of values of type <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> to add to the collection.
Removes all <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> values from the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameterCollection"></xref>.
Indicates whether a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value"></xref> is contained in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> to look for in the collection.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> is in the collection; otherwise `false`.
Indicates whether a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> with the specified name exists in the collection.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> to look for in the collection.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> is in the collection; otherwise `false`.
Copies an array of items to the collection starting at the specified index.
The array of items to copy to the collection.
The index in the collection to copy the items.
Specifies the number of items in the collection.
The number of items in the collection.
Exposes the <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator"></xref> method, which supports a simple iteration over a collection by a .NET Framework data provider.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
Returns the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
The index of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
Returns <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> the object with the specified name.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> the object with the specified name.
Returns the index of the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object in the collection.
The index of the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object.
Returns the index of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object with the specified name.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object in the collection.
The index of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object with the specified name.
Inserts the specified index of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object with the specified name into the collection at the specified index.
The index at which to insert the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object to insert into the collection.
Specifies whether the collection is a fixed size.
`true` if the collection is a fixed size; otherwise `false`.
Specifies whether the collection is read-only.
`true` if the collection is read-only; otherwise `false`.
Specifies whether the collection is synchronized.
`true` if the collection is synchronized; otherwise `false`.
Gets and sets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the parameter.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> at the specified index.
The specified index does not exist.
Gets and sets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> with the specified name.
The name of the parameter.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> with the specified name.
The specified index does not exist.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object to remove.
Removes the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object at the specified from the collection.
The index where the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object is located.
Removes the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object with the specified name from the collection.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object to remove.
Sets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object at the specified index to a new value.
The index where the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object is located.
The new <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> value.
Sets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object with the specified name to a new value.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> object in the collection.
The new <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> value.
Specifies the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to be used to synchronize access to the collection.
A <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameterCollection"></xref>.
Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameterCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.Item%2A>.
The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
The element at the specified index.
Gets or sets the parameter at the specified index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbParameterCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDataParameterCollection> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Data.IDataParameterCollection.Item%2A>.
The name of the parameter to retrieve.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> at the specified index.
